response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it would be worth $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the potential benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price reflects the balance between the product's value to you and my aim to ensure a fair return on investment. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
